comment.author: 59182922@N03
comment._content:
This looks like the Shadwell Estate.

Henry Spencer Hardtman Berkeley 60
Born: 1851, St. Kitts, West Indies
Marriage: Unknown; Died: 30 September 1918, Bures, Suffolk aged 67;
General Notes: Attorney-General Leeward Islands Fountains estate, St Kitts, encumbered 1885 - co-owned with GH Berkekley, J HH Berkeley. Own estate - Cedar Hill and Lower Freeman's estate encumbered in 1885.
